ruling: - You activate the effect of [[Sasuke Samurai #4]] at the beginning of the Damage Step, before the monster is flipped face-up. A monster destroyed by the effect of [[Sasuke Samurai #4]] is not destroyed as a result of battle. There is no damage calculation. It is not flipped face-up. Any Flip Effects it has are not activated.
- If [[Sasuke Samurai #4]] attacks a face-up Attack Position [[Reflect Bounder]], the effect of [[Sasuke Samurai #4]] is resolved before the effect of [[Reflect Bounder]].
